articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Reply Messages to Nigerian and Ugandan Presidents
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Reply Messages to Nigerian and Ugandan Presidents
 Pyongyang, August 8 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un sent messages to Nigerian President Muhammadu Buhari and Ugandan President Yoweri Kaguta Museveni in reply to their messages on the occasion of the 21st anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 In the reply messages Kim Jong Un deeply thanked them for kindly sending messages praising the immortal exploits performed by Kim Il Sung and expressing high respects and firm solidarity on the occasion.
					
					 Expressing belief that the good relations of friendship and cooperation between the DPRK and the relevant countries would grow stronger, he wished the presidents greater successes in their responsible work.

articles.title: DPRK Foreign Minister Reiterates Its Commitment to Lasting Peace and Security on Korean Peninsula and Region
articles.content:
DPRK Foreign Minister Reiterates Its Commitment to Lasting Peace and Security on Korean Peninsula and Region
 Pyongyang, August 8 (KCNA) -- The DPRK will strive to develop good neighborly relations with all the countries that respect our national sovereignty and that are friendly to us. We will also fulfill our commitment to lasting peace and security in the Korean peninsula and in the region based on the principles of respect for sovereignty, non-interference in internal affairs and equality as advocated by this ASEAN Regional Forum.
					 DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Su Yong, head of a DPRK delegation, said this on Thursday at the 22nd ministerial meeting of the ASEAN Regional Forum held in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia.
					
					 He went on:
					
					 Since the last ASEAN Regional Forum was held, the overall security situation of the Asia-Pacific region can be characterized by features of more complex and complicated nature in general.
					
					 The Korean peninsula is the place where the vicious cycle of aggravating situation is continuing in the most serious manner throughout the Asia-Pacific region and the world at large.
					
					 Large scale joint military exercises are being conducted against the DPRK several times a year in south Korea and its vicinity and they present themselves with greater provocations with greater degree of danger with each passing day.
					
					 What the U.S. really wants is not the denuclearization of the Korean peninsula but the Americanization of the entire Korean peninsula.
					
					 The strategic goal that runs through the hostile policy of the United States against the DPRK is to eliminate the socialist system in the Korean peninsula, which is the choice of our people.
					
					 Whoever cares about peace and security in the region has to pay due attention to the situation in the Korean peninsula and to that end, make every possible effort to put an end to the U.S. hostile policy against the DPRK.
					
					 If the U.S. decides to boldly suspend large-scale joint military exercises, source of aggravating situation in the Korean peninsula, many issues including U.S. concerns in the region will stand a chance of opportunity.
					
					 However, if the U.S. continues to use the DPRK as a pretext of only strengthening its military alliances with massive arms buildup aimed at recovering position of hegemony in the Asia-Pacific region, it will inevitably lead to the outbreak of the second Korean War.
					
					 We have the power to face any type of war whatever the choice of the U.S. is.

articles.title: Talks between DPRK, Malaysian FMs Held
articles.content:
Talks between DPRK, Malaysian FMs Held
 Pyongyang, August 8 (KCNA) -- There took place talks on Friday between DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Su Yong, head of the DPRK government delegation on an official visit to Malaysia, and Malaysian Foreign Minister Datuk Anifah Aman.
					 The talks discussed the issues of further developing the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries.
					
					 That day the DPRK government delegation was invited to a reception hosted by the Malaysian foreign minister and took part in a briefing on economy, trade and investment of Malaysia.

articles.title: WPK Praised by Indonesian Party Leader
articles.content:
WPK Praised by Indonesian Party Leader
 Pyongyang, August 8 (KCNA) -- Ri Jong Ryul, DPRK ambassador to Indonesia, paid a farewell call on Megawati Soekarnoputri, general chairwoman of the Central Directive Council of the Indonesian Democratic Party of Struggle, on August 4.
					 Rejoicing over the fact that the Korean people have worked fresh miracles every day in building a thriving nation under the guidance of Marshal Kim Jong Un, the general chairwoman wished them greater successes in the future.
					
					 Expressing support to the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and people of the DPRK in their efforts to solve the reunification issue by the concerted efforts of the Korean nation free from foreign interference, she hoped that Korea would be reunified at an early date in a peaceful way.
					
					 She warmly congratulated the Korean people on the 70th founding anniversary of the WPK, saying the WPK is a tested party as it has led the Korean people's struggle to victory for the past seven decades and that she would make sustained efforts to boost the relations of friendship and cooperation with the WPK in the future.

articles.title: Delegation of State Commission of Quality Management Leaves for Singapore
articles.content:
Delegation of State Commission of Quality Management Leaves for Singapore
 Pyongyang, August 8 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the State Commission of Quality Management led by Chairman Ri Chol Jin left here on Saturday to take part in the international seminar of chiefs of national standardization organizations in the Asia-Pacific region of the International Organization for Standardization to be held in Singapore.

articles.title: Widow of Ex-President of S. Korea Kim Dae Jung Flies Back
articles.content:
Widow of Ex-President of S. Korea Kim Dae Jung Flies Back
 Pyongyang, August 8 (KCNA) -- Ri Hui Ho, widow of ex-president of south Korea Kim Dae Jung, and her party flew back Saturday.
					 They were seen off by officials concerned at Pyongyang International Airport.
					
					 During their stay they visited the Breast Tumour Institute of Pyongyang Maternity Hospital, Okryu Children's Hospital, the Pyongyang Baby Home and Orphanage and the Pyongyang Home for the Aged. They went to Mt. Myohyang to visit the International Friendship Exhibition House and Pohyon Temple and went sightseeing to various places of the scenic spot.

articles.title: World Diving Champion Feted
articles.content:
World Diving Champion Feted
 Pyongyang, August 8 (KCNA) -- The DPRK Cabinet gave a reception at Okryu Restaurant on Saturday for Kim Kuk Hyang who placed first at the 16th FINA World Championships.
					 Present at the reception were Kim Yong Jin, vice-premier of the Cabinet, Kim Yong Hun, minister of Physical Culture and Sports, Ri Jong Mu, general of the Korean People's Army, officials concerned, players and coaches who participated in the championships and their families.
					
					 Kim Yong Jin made a speech at the reception to be followed by reply speech of Kim Kuk Hyang.

articles.title: Red Flag Relay of KPA Service Personnel Goes on in West Coastal Areas
articles.content:
Red Flag Relay of KPA Service Personnel Goes on in West Coastal Areas
 Pyongyang, August 8 (KCNA) -- Service Personnel of the Korean People's Army (KPA) participating in the red flag relay arrived in South Phyongan Province via Jagang and North Phyongan provinces after starting from the area of Mt. Paektu to mark the 70th anniversary of Korea's liberation.
					 They visited the Kosanjin and Kumchon revolutionary sites associated with giant footprints of the peerlessly great persons of Mt. Paektu.
					
					 They visited a monument to the feats performed by 14 fighters in the self-blasting spirit. They met with fighter pilots who performed heroic exploits in the operation to ensure the successful launch of satellite Kwangmyongsong-2.
					
					 They arrived at the historic site associated with the history of the Fatherland Liberation War on Saturday.
					
					 The site is the place where the supreme command of the Korean People's Army was located from January, Juche 40 (1951) to July, Juche 42 (1953).
					
					 There President Kim Il Sung defeated the U.S. imperialists who boasted of being the "strongest" in the world and defended the destiny of the country and the sovereignty of the nation.
					
					 That day service personnel held a meeting there to learn about the greatness of the President and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Ri Chang Gil, chairman of the KPA Committee of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League, said in his speech that all the service personnel should become staunch defenders of the country strong in idea and faith with an unshakable will that they are sure to win in the confrontation with the U.S. as they are led by Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 A congratulatory poem "Country extends congratulations to the young vanguard of the Paektusan army!" was recited to be followed by choruses "Long Live Generalissimo Kim Il Sung" and "Song of the Korean People's Army".
					
					 The performers called for greeting a new day of eternal victory by carrying on the march started from Mt. Paektu to the end, holding Kim Jong Un, illustrious brilliant commander, in high esteem.
					
					 At the end of the meeting service personnel went round the site.
					
					 On the same day they visited the Revolutionary Martyrs Cemetery on Mt. Taesong.
					
					 They laid bouquets before the bust of anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk and paid tribute to her.

articles.title: DPRK Scholar on Parks' Sycophancy toward Japan
articles.content:
DPRK Scholar on Parks' Sycophancy toward Japan
 Pyongyang, August 8 (KCNA) -- Park Geun Hye and Park Geun Ryong of south Korea recently made pro-Japanese remarks, enraging the entire Korean nation, as their father Park Chung-Hee did as a faithful servant of Japan in the past.
					 In this regard, Dr. Kang Chol of Kim Il Sung University told KCNA:
					
					 Fifty years ago, traitor Park Chung-Hee brought bloody pressure upon the youth and students and other people of south Korea protesting against the treacherous south Korea-Japan "agreement".
					
					 At present, his daughter Park Geun Hye, the chief executive of south Korea, has cried out for the restored relations with Japan, talking about so-called new era and strategic interests.
					
					 And Park Geun Ryong, her younger sister, is engaged in pro-Japanese traitorous acts. In an interview with Japanese media sometime ago, she embellished the issue of comfort women for the imperial Japanese army and shielded the visit to the Yasukuni Shrine by politicians in Japan, a wrong behavior not only many countries but also its senior ally, the United States, stand against.
					
					 She is no doubt a special class lackey of modern-type Japanese militarism.
					
					 With the 70th anniversary of Korea's liberation from Japan's colonial rule approaching, all Koreans are now condemning the hideous crimes committed by the Japanese imperialists against the nation in the past.
					
					 But, the Parks engage themselves in flunkeyist treachery, calling the king of Japan "HM emperor". This is a disgrace to the Korean nation.
					
					 The group of traitors living on sycophancy toward Japan and U.S. should be mindful that the day is coming nearer when they will face the stern punishment by the entire nation.

articles.title: Mangyongdae Children's Camp Takes on New Looks
articles.content:
Mangyongdae Children's Camp Takes on New Looks
Pyongyang, August 8 (KCNA) -- The Mangyongdae Children's Camp at the foot of Mt. Ryongak in the suburbs of Pyongyang undergoes a complete change.
					All objects at the camp are now being renovated at a fast tempo, thanks to the devoted efforts of Pyongyang city officials and builders.
					
					Those officials and builders have accelerated the renovation project under a detailed plan to renew the looks of the camp in keeping with the requirements of the new century.

articles.title: Premier Soccer League for Torch Cup in DPRK
articles.content:
Premier Soccer League for Torch Cup in DPRK
 Pyongyang, August 8 (KCNA) -- The men's premier soccer league for Torch Cup goes on here, divided into two groups, starting on July 27. 
					 Included in group A are April 25, Pyongyang, Amnokgang, Sonbong, Chobyong, Myohyangsan and Ministry of Light Industry teams and group B Ponghwasan, Kigwancha, Wolmido, Sobaeksu, Rimyongsu, Hwaebul and Jangsubong teams.
					
					 April 25 and Pyongyang teams are winners in the Mangyongdae Prize Sports Games and the Sports Contest for Pochonbo Torch Prize.
					
					 Taking the lead in group A round robin are April 25, Pyongyang, Ministry of Light Industry and Chobyong teams. The April 25 team scored ten goals in the matches with Amnokgang and Myohyangsan teams.
					
					 In group B there were eight matches until now, six of which ended in a draw.
					
					 The group league matches will come to a close on August 24 and there will be the semifinals on August 25 and the finals on August 28.

articles.title: U.S. Moves for Igniting Bio-Chemical Warfare under Fire
articles.content:
U.S. Moves for Igniting Bio-Chemical Warfare under Fire
 Pyongyang, August 8 (KCNA) -- Recently the U.S. and its lackeys labeled the Pyongyang Bio-technical Institute, a scientific research and production base of the DPRK, as "latest facilities for producing poisonous anthrax germs" and "biological weapons factory camouflaged as a civilian enterprise".
					 Rodong Sinmun Saturday in an article in this regard:
					
					 This is a trite method being employed by the U.S. to impair the prestige of the anti-U.S. and independent country and isolate it in the international arena through ridiculous red herring and justify their moves for aggression.
					
					 Before pressurizing and isolating other countries and launching military attacks on them, the U.S. has always given precedence to the false propaganda aimed to justify those actions.
					
					 With no false propaganda can the U.S. conceal its true colors as the chief culprit of a bio-chemical warfare.
					
					 The U.S. is, indeed, a criminal state which has imposed bigger misfortune and pain on mankind by using nuclear and bio-chemical weapons.
					
					 Bio-chemical weapons are the U.S. basic means for exterminating other countries and nations and a bio-chemical warfare is one of its basic military operations for realizing its world domination.
					
					 However, the DPRK will never allow the U.S. to hurt even a blade of grass and a tree in its inviolable territory.
					
					 The service personnel and people of the DPRK will never remain a passive onlooker to the U.S. ever more undisguised moves for a new Korean war.
					
					 The U.S. would be well advised to stop acting rashly, clearly understanding the DPRK's strong will to fight it.

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Conservative Group Fated to Go to Ruin: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet Conservative Group Fated to Go to Ruin: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, August 8 (KCNA) -- The results of the recent opinion poll conducted by a media institution of south Korea said that the support base which the chief executive has always claimed to be "solid" is collapsing. It was reported that the support rate of persons aged 60 and above and that in Pusan and South Kyongsang Province for Park Geun Hye sharply dropped.
					 Rodong Sinmun Saturday in an article says in this regard:
					
					 The serious ruling crisis of the south Korean puppet group is an inevitable product of its country-selling policy.
					
					 How to treat the people is a touchstone distinguishing the popular character of politics from its unpopular character and its progressive nature from its reactionary nature.
					
					 The group has desperately pursued the policy of confrontation with the DPRK, bedeviling the north-south relations and increasing the danger of war. It has followed an unprecedented sycophantic policy of making all fields of south Korea totally dependent on the U.S. It has, at the same time, intensified the fascist suppression, throwing a stumbling block in the way of democratic development of south Korean society and turning the whole of south Korea into a tundra of independence, democracy and human rights. Moreover, it has put economy into bankruptcy and people's living into destitution. This is the unanimous comment of the south Korean public on the present puppet authorities.
					
					 The history of the successive puppet rulers of south Korea is recorded with their despicable sycophancy toward the U.S., fascist dictatorship and anti-reunification acts.
					
					 However, history does not know such wicked group of traitors as the Park Geun Hye group which has committed unspeakable crimes against the nation.
					
					 The disillusion and resentment of the south Korean people at the traitorous group's politics are running higher.
					
					 Merciless is the people's punishment of the treacherous regime hurting the dignity and interests of the country and nation.
					
					 It is necessity of history that the traitors are bound to go to ruin as they are going against the aspiration and demand of the people.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Slams U.S. and S. Korea's Projected Ulji Freedom Guardian
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Slams U.S. and S. Korea's Projected Ulji Freedom Guardian
 Pyongyang, August 8 (KCNA) -- The U.S. and the south Korean puppet regime are planning to stage again Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military drills from August 17.
					 The authorities of the U.S. Department of Defense and Department of State and the south Korean puppet Ministry of Defense are now busy officially terming the drills "transparent and defensive", "regular and open" ones in an effort to play down their criminal nature.
					
					 However, they can never conceal the aggressive and reactionary nature of the drills as typical saber-rattling for making a preemptive nuclear strike at the DPRK and a test nuclear war.
					
					 The war rehearsal is a reckless military provocation of war servants to ignite a nuclear war any time by pushing the situation on the Korean peninsula to an extreme pitch of tension.
					
					 As clear to everybody, the war maniacs of the U.S. and south Korea, whenever staging Ulji Freedom Guardian, deployed many ultra-modern nuclear attack means in south Korea and its vicinity to stage provocative drills under the simulated conditions of a preemptive attack and all-out war against the DPRK.
					
					 Involved in the joint war drills were not only nuclear strike means and other latest war hardware but almost every commanding post of the U.S. units to be hurled into the war actions in contingency in Korea and commanding posts of above regiment level of the south Korean puppet ground, naval and air forces, central and local administrative organs in south Korea and even munitions and civilian enterprises. Consequently, the sky, land and seas of south Korea turned into theaters of north-targeting drills.
					
					 This year's Ulji Freedom Guardian is chiefly aimed to help the U.S. forces and the south Korean puppet troops get familiar with procedures of a nuclear war against the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. and the puppet forces announced that the projected saber-rattling would involve rehearsals for applying the details of the "tailored deterrent strategy", a scenario for a preemptive nuclear strike at the DPRK, to an actual war.
					
					 The "strategy" is designed to make a preemptive nuclear strike at the DPRK in case a "sign of use of nukes by the north" is detected.
					
					 As the plan for applying the above-said strategy to an actual war will get pronounced in the projected saber-rattling, it will put peace and security on the Korean peninsula and in other parts of Northeast Asia at greater peril.
					
					 The DPRK urged the U.S. and the south Korean authorities more than once to stop their joint military drills and opt for bringing about detente and creating a peaceful environment on the peninsula in order to make a decisive turn in the north-south relations this year that marks the 70th anniversary of Korea's liberation.
					
					 But they have challenged the DPRK's offers by staging mad-cap joint military drills, talking about non-existent "threat from the north."
					
					 For instance, they are going to stage a war drill to stifle the DPRK by force of arms through their Red Flag joint air drills in Alaska from Aug. 10 to 21.
					
					 This being a stark reality, the U.S. is working hard to mislead the public opinion by giving impression that the dialogue has not yet opened due to the DPRK in a bid to shift the blame for the abortive dialogue concerning the nuclear issue on the Korean peninsula on to the DPRK.
					
					 As recognized by everybody, it is attributable to the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK, notably, joint military drills for aggression that only tension is escalating on the peninsula in the absence of dialogue.
					
					 The U.S. is wholly to blame for this tension.
					
					 With no rhetoric can it evade its responsibility for having harassed peace and stability on the peninsula and in other parts of the region through its ceaseless joint military drills.
					
					 Ulji Freedom Guardian will entail tough military counteraction of the army of the DPRK to firmly defend the dignity of the nation and sovereignty of the country.

articles.title: S. Korean Organizations Clarify Their Will to Stage Anti-"Government" Actions
articles.content:
S. Korean Organizations Clarify Their Will to Stage Anti-"Government" Actions
 Pyongyang, August 8 (KCNA) -- Organizations of different circles in south Korea declared their plan to stir up the atmosphere of struggle for independent reunification across south Korea with August 15, the day of Korea's liberation, as a momentum, according to the south Korean internet paper Thongil News.
					 The preparatory committee for joint national events to mark the 15th anniversary of the June 15 joint declaration and the 70th anniversary of country's liberation declared it would hold a conference for national reunification near University Street in Seoul on August 15.
					
					 The committee for promotion of August 15 all-people conference for peace against war decided to hold the conference and stage a march.
					
					 The Confederation of Trade Unions set the period of reunification movement from August 9 to 15 and announced that it would form vanguard of workers for reunification and stage actions across south Korea in protest against the U.S. anthrax germ experiment and moves to introduce THAAD and Japan's moves for rearmament.  It also declared it would hold a meeting of workers on August 15 to protest the Park Geun Hye regime's unpopular rule.
					
					  The Federation of University Students also declared that it would form a group of marchers for reunification and march across south Korea from August 8 to 15 in demand of the probe into the truth about introduction of anthrax germs, lifting of "May 24 step", stop to Ulji Freedom Guardian exercises and probe into the truth behind the Intelligence Service's illegal hacking.

articles.title: South Korean Paper Assails Chief Executive for Sacrificing Workers
articles.content:
South Korean Paper Assails Chief Executive for Sacrificing Workers
 Pyongyang, August 8 (KCNA) -- Kyunghyang Daily News of south Korea on Aug. 6 carried an editorial denouncing the puppet chief executive for imposing sacrifices upon the workers.
					 The editorial said Park Geun Hye talked volumes about four reforms in labor, education, finance, etc. in her public statement that day but she neither repented of the regime's policy failure nor set forth any solution.
					
					 The editorial denounced Park for misinterpreting the essence of young people's joblessness and economic crisis, shifting the blame onto the workers and stirring up social conflict.
					
					 The Democratic Alliance for New Politics, an opposition party, held a press conference at which it strongly criticized Park for letting loose tirade to the people without making any apology for the MERS crisis and Intelligence Service's illegal hacking.
					
					 The opposition party ridiculed the statement, saying it ended up crying out for "labor reform" aimed to pass the buck for economic failure to the workers.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Introduced in Romania
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Introduced in Romania
 Pyongyang, August 8 (KCNA) -- The full text of leader Kim Jong Il's work "Let Us Carry Out the Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung's Instructions for National Reunification" was posted by the Socialist Party of Romania on its website on August 3.
					 The work, published on August 4, Juche 86 (1997), deals with the immortal exploits performed by President Kim Il Sung for the cause of national reunification.
					
					 The work formulates the three principles of national reunification, the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo and the 10-point programme of the great unity of the whole nation as the three charters for national reunification and indicates the tasks for accomplishing the cause of national reunification and the ways to do so on the basis of them.

articles.title: Exploits of Kim Il Sung Praised Abroad
articles.content:
Exploits of Kim Il Sung Praised Abroad
 Pyongyang, August 8 (KCNA) -- Events took place in various countries to mark the 70th anniversary of Korea's liberation from July 28 to August 1.
					 They included a seminar on President Kim Il Sung's exploits in Romania and round-table talks in the Czech Republic, Germany and Malaysia.
					
					 The chairman of the Socialist Party of Romania who is chairman of the Romanian national preparatory committee for celebrating the 70th anniversary of Korea's liberation said it was the President who brought joy of national resurrection and a happy life to the Korean people stricken with grief over being a stateless nation.
					
					 The general secretary of the C.C., the Czechoslovak Communist Party who is chairman of the Czech preparatory committee for celebrating the 70th anniversaries of the founding of the Workers' Party of Korea and Korea's liberation praised the President as a prominent leader who defeated the U.S. and Japanese imperialists in one generation and built a strong socialist country in Korea.
					
					 The chairman of the preparatory committee of the Federal Republic of Germany-DPRK Association for celebrating the 70th anniversaries of Korea's liberation and the founding the WPK said as the President liberated the country, the Korean people came to have genuine people's country where they became masters of everything for the first time in history.
					
					 The director of a Malaysian company said the President was the leader of the Korean people, who founded the DPRK under the banner of the Juche idea and led them to prosperity and happiness.
					
					 The director of another Malaysian company said the exploits the President performed by liberating Korea and turning the DPRK into an invincible power would shine long century after century.

articles.title: Issue of Korean Peninsula Has Become International Matter: Egyptian Paper
articles.content:
Issue of Korean Peninsula Has Become International Matter: Egyptian Paper
 Pyongyang, August 8 (KCNA) -- The Egyptian paper Al-Ahram carried an article titled "Reunification of Korea is wish of all" on July 28.
					 The article said:
					
					 To ensure stability on the Korean peninsula has become a wish of not only the people in the north and the south of Korea but also those in the countries of Southeast Asia who had long suffered war disasters in the last century.
					
					 But this wish has not yet come true.
					
					 It is 15 years since the first north-south summit in Korea but the inter-Korean relations are getting worse.
					
					 It is attributable to the U.S. which has deeply interfered in the issue of the north-south relations of Korea, playing the role of "international gendarme" under the pretext of "ensuring global peace and security."
					
					 The reality clearly proves that the U.S. seeks to meet its own interests only.
					
					 In the final analysis, the issue of the Korean peninsula has become an international matter.

articles.title: U.S. Anti-DPRK "Human Rights" Racket Condemned by German Body
articles.content:
U.S. Anti-DPRK "Human Rights" Racket Condemned by German Body
 Pyongyang, August 8 (KCNA) -- The Anti-Imperialist Forum of Germany made public a statement on August 3 denouncing the U.S. for again finding fault with the DPRK over the issue of flesh traffic.
					 The statement said:
					
					 The U.S. had better mind its own business, not encroaching upon the dignity of the DPRK which has the time-honored history spanning five thousand years.
					
					 It appeared and has grown corpulent through brutal genocide of Indians, exploitation and oppression of other countries and slave trade.
					
					 In the final analysis, the U.S. has neither morality nor reason.
					
					 It should refrain from pointing accusing finger at other countries.

articles.title: Anniversary of Korea's Liberation Observed by Organization of DR Congo
articles.content:
Anniversary of Korea's Liberation Observed by Organization of DR Congo
 Pyongyang, August 8 (KCNA) -- The National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea of DR Congo released a bulletin titled "Lesson drawn from Second World War and peace on Korean peninsula" on August 2 to observe the 70th anniversary of Korea's liberation.
					 It is 70 years since the end of the Second World War, the cruelest and fiercest in the world history of wars, but the imperialists are still keen on high-handed and arbitrary practices in the international arena in a bid to realize their wild ambition for dominating the world, the bulletin said, and went on:
					
					 The world public is unanimous in predicting that a new world war would break out on the Korean peninsula where interests of powers are intermingled and military tension remains the highest.
					
					 That is why it is the most important for preventing a new world war to ensure durable peace on the peninsula.
					
					 The U.S. is the very harasser of peace and security on the peninsula.
					
					It is a well-known fact that the U.S. has long worked hard to ignite the third world war by invading the DPRK, regarding the peninsula as a springboard for invading Asia.
					
					 This is an open threat to the DPRK and a challenge to peace on the peninsula.
					
					 The danger of a war will increase on the peninsula as long as the U.S. persists in its reckless moves for aggression to stifle the DPRK.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un envia mensajes de respuesta a presidentes de Nigeria y Uganda
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un envia mensajes de respuesta a presidentes de Nigeria y Uganda
Pyongyang, 8 de agosto (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un envio mensajes de respuesta al presidente de la Republica Federal de Nigeria, Muhammadu Buhari, y al presidente de la Republica de Uganda, Yoweri Kaguta Museveni. 
					El Mariscal expreso profundo agradecimiento a los mandatarios que con motivo del dia de fallecimiento del Presidente Kim Il Sung, le remitieron los mensajes elogiando las imborrables proezas del lider coreano, expresando gran respeto a este gran hombre y manifestando la firme solidaridad. 
					
					Convencido de que las excelentes relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre los paises seguiran fortaleciendose y desarrollandose tambien en el futuro, el Mariscal les deseo mayores exitos a los destinatarios en sus trabajos responsables.

articles.title: Parten de regreso Ri Hui Ho y su comitiva
articles.content:
Parten de regreso Ri Hui Ho y su comitiva
Pyongyang, 8 de agosto (ACNC) -- Partieron el dia 8 de esta capital Ri Hui Ho, esposa del ex presidente del Sur de Corea, Kim Dae Jung, y su comitiva.
					En el aeropuerto, ellos fueron despedidos por los funcionarios de la rama correspondiente.
					
					Durante su permanencia, ellos recorrieron el Instituto de Tumor Mamario adscrito a la Casa de Maternidad de Pyongyang, el Hospital de Pediatria Okryu, el hospicio y orfanato de Pyongyang, el asilo de los ancianos de Pyongyang y en el monte Myohyang visitaron la Exposicion Permanente de Amistad Internacional y el Templo Pohyon e hicieron un viaje de recreo por varios puntos de este lugar famoso.

articles.title: Consejo de Ministros ofrece banquete por Kim Kuk Hyang
articles.content:
Consejo de Ministros ofrece banquete por Kim Kuk Hyang
Pyongyang, 8 de agosto (ACNC) -- El Consejo de Ministros de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea ofrecio el dia 8 en el Restaurante Okryu un banquete en honor de Kim Kuk Hyang, quien gano la medalla de oro en el XVI Campeonato Mundial de la Federacion Internacional de Natacion. 
					Estuvieron presentes el vicepremier Kim Yong Jin, el ministro de Deportes, Kim Yong Hun, el general de ejercito del Ejercito Popular de Corea, Ri Jong Mu, los funcionarios correspondientes, los jugadores y entrenadores participantes en el Campeonato y los familiares de Kim Kuk Hyang.
					
					El vicepremier Kim Yong Jin y la campeona pronunciaron discursos.

articles.title: Ejercicios belicos anti-RPDC causaran venganza militar, advierte ACNC
articles.content:
Ejercicios belicos anti-RPDC causaran venganza militar, advierte ACNC
Pyongyang, 8 de agosto (ACNC) -- Estados Unidos y el Sur de Corea intentan desarrollar desde el dia 17 los ejercicios belicos conjuntos Ulji Freedom Guardian. 
					Ahora, los secretarios de Defensa y de Estado de EE.UU., el ministro de Defensa titere del Sur de Corea y otros tipejos se esfuerzan por debilitar el caracter criminal de ese simulacro conjunto describiendolo oficialmente como ejercicio "transparente y defensivo" y "regular y abierto". 
					
					Pero, no pueden ocultar jamas el caracter agresivo y reaccionario de ese simulacro como tipico ejercicio de ataque y la guerra nuclear de ensayo contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea. 
					
					Este simulacro deviene la imprudente provocacion militar de los maniacos de guerra para provocar la guerra nuclear en cualquier momento llevando a una extremada fase la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana. 
					
					Como es conocido por todos, cada vez que se desarrollaba el simulacro Ulji Freedom Guardian, los belicistas internos y externos desplegaron enormes medios de ataque nuclear ultramodernos en el Sur de Corea y su contorno y libraron con frenesi los ejercicios provocativos encaminados a asestar el ataque de sorpresa y la guerra total contra la RPDC. 
					
					En los ejercicios militares conjuntos se incorporan los medios de ataque nuclear y otros equipos sofisticados de guerra, la mayoria de los puestos de mando de las unidades norteamericanas a ser lanzadas al frente coreano en el tiempo de emergencia, los organismos de mando de nivel de regimiento para arriba de las fuerzas terrestres, navales y aereas surcoreanas, los organos administrativos centrales y locales, consorcios militares y empresas civiles del Sur de Corea convirtiendo asi el territorio surcoreano en el campo de ensayo de la guerra de agresion a la RPDC. 
					
					El simulacro Ulji Freedom Guardian de este ano tambien se enfoca a adiestrar tales procesos de la guerra nuclear anti-RPDC. 
					
					EE.UU. y los titeres aclararon que en el presente simulacro realizaran los ejercicios para aplicar en la guerra real los contenidos concretos de la "estrategia del disuasivo de forma de ajuste", guion de ataque preventivo nuclear. 
					
					La aplicacion de este guion de guerra nuclear anti-RPDC pone mas en peligro la paz y la seguridad de la Peninsula Coreana y el resto del Nordeste Asiatico. 
					
					A fin de traer a toda costa un viraje trascendental en las relaciones intercoreanas en este ano del 70o aniversario de la liberacion de la patria, la RPDC exigio en reiteradas ocasiones a EE.UU. y al Sur de Corea a parar los ejercicios belicos conjuntos y dirigirse a aliviar la tension de la Peninsula Coreana y preparar el ambiente pacifico. 
					
					Pero, EE.UU. y los titeres surcoreanos respondieron con la intensificacion de los simulacros conjuntos hablando de la supuesta "amenaza del Norte". 
					
					Como su continuacion tratan de desarrollar el ejercicio belico para aplastar militarmente la RPDC en el marco de los ejercicios aereos conjuntos Red Flag que tendran lugar del 10 al 21 en Alaska. 
					
					A pesar de tales hechos, EE.UU. trata de imputar a la RPDC la culpabilidad de la suspension del dialogo sobre el problema nuclear de la Peninsula Coreana. 
					
					Todo el mundo reconoce que la agravacion persistente de la tension en vez del dialogo en la Peninsula Coreana se debe a la politica norteamericana de hostilidad a la RPDC, en particular a los incesantes ejercicios belicos conjuntos. 
					
					EE.UU. es el autor de la agravacion de la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana. 
					
					El imperio no puede eludir nunca la responsabilidad de haber perturbado la paz y la estabilidad de la Peninsula Coreana y la region mediante los incesantes ejercicios belicos conjuntos. 
					
					Ulji Freedom Guardian causara la venganza militar del Ejercito Popular de Corea decidido a defender con firmeza la dignidad y la soberania de la nacion.
